statements: SELECT * FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE user_id = '12345'
SELECT name, age FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE gender = 'female'
SELECT * FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, dietary_preferences FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE allergies ->> 'nuts' = 'true'
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) FROM user_diet_preferences GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, age, dietary_preferences->'vegetarian' AS is_vegetarian FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, name, age, allergies->'gluten' AS has_gluten_allergy FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE dietary_preferences->>'vegan' = 'true';
SELECT name, gender, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user_diet_preferences GROUP BY name, gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender, dietary_preferences, allergies FROM user_diet_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE dietary_preferences LIKE '%vegan%';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name ILIKE 'chicken%';
SELECT user_id, username, dietary_preferences FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE ingredients @> ARRAY['chicken', 'rice'];
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name='Spaghetti Carbonara';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id='12345678';
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE dietary_preferences='Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, allergies FROM users WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, dietary_preference FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE dietary_information = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT user_id, recipe_id FROM UserRecipes ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserRecipes WHERE user_id = 2 AND recipe_id = 5;
SELECT recipe_name, dietary_information FROM Recipes WHERE dietary_information IN ('Vegetarian', 'Vegan') ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, allergies FROM UserPreferences WHERE dietary_preference = 'Gluten-Free' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, dietary_preference FROM users WHERE dietary_preference='Vegetarian';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name='Pasta Carbonara';
SELECT user_id, recipe_name, rating FROM user_preferences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE dietary_preference IS NOT NULL;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE jsonb_array_length(ingredients) > 3;
SELECT u.username, r.recipe_name FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN recipes r ON up.recipe_id = r.recipe_id;
SELECT u.username, r.recipe_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN recipes r ON up.recipe_id = r.recipe_id;
SELECT r.recipe_name, allergies.allergen_name FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN allergies ON r.recipe_id = allergies.allergy_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes
SELECT user_id, username, age, dietary_preference FROM users
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes
SELECT preference_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM users WHERE dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type, instructions FROM recipes WHERE LENGTH(ingredients) > 100;
SELECT r.recipe_name, u.username, rr.rating FROM recipes r JOIN recipe_ratings rr ON r.recipe_id = rr.recipe_id JOIN users u ON rr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE rr.rating >= 4;
SELECT u.username, ua.allergy_name FROM users u JOIN user_allergies ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.allergy_name IN ('Peanuts', 'Shellfish');
